name: 施欣文
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule: We will work through Units 6–12 of the American Headway textbook, giving students additional practice in speaking, reading, writing, and grammar. Students are encouraged to actively participate in discussion and should be prepared to present in front of the class. Tests and quizzes will be announced as the course continues, depending on the speed at which students progress.
scorePolicy:
Homework: 25%
Quizzes/Tests: 25%
Participation: 10%
Skits, Presentations, and Oral Work: 10%
Midterm: 15%
Final: 15%
